question: The "Son", "Danzon", "Mambo", "Cha-cha-cha" are the music genres of which nation?
explanation: Son, Danzon, Mambo, Cha-cha-cha are the music genres of Cuba. All these music genres express Cuban culture. The central form of this music genres is "Son" which greatly influenced shaping others such as Danzon, Mambo and Cha-cha-cha. Danzon is the official music genre and dance of Cuba. Perez Prado populated "Mambo" in the Cuban style.
